DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Texas Dirt Special Effects Makeup Powder (2.3 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Special Effects Makeup Powder in Texas Dirt is formulated to create a realistic effect of being covered with sooty ash. Texas Dirt Powder has an ultrafine, loose consistency that can easily be applied for just the right touch to enhance a character's makeup. Mehron Texas Dirt Powder has the same look and feel of actual dirt. Special Effects Makeup Powder from Mehron are used throughout the Professional Entertainment Industry to special make up effects. 4 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 2.3 ounce bottle of Mehron Specialty Powder will give dozens to a hundred applications, depending on use
